name: Fish's Trip
description:
Winter has arrived in a land where Flop fish live.
Now they need to swim to a island in the hot climate to escape the cold.
This is not a easy task, as the seas offers many dangers.

Using just one button you can control the fish by the seas.
Eat cherries so they do not get tired.
Collect rubies to buy maps, because Flop need many maps to get to the destination he wants.
Dodge the dangers of the sea.

It is possible to play using mouse, keyboard or gamepad.
And four people simultaneously.

Inventory items, such as Collectible Cards, will be available in the future.
